医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/英文
体育活动课程可能会对儿童的认知表现产生积极影响研究人员评估了体育活动课程对认知表现的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Physically-active-lessons-may-positively-impact-the-cognitive-performance-of-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Physically-active-lessons-may-positively-impact-the-cognitive-performance-of-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d569d5e4-8937-491f-96b4-f90f18b7f039 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 07:57:00 -0400 Physically active lessons may positively impact the cognitive performance of children
评估饮食趋势对生殖结果的影响研究人员评估了饮食趋势对生殖结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Evaluating-the-effects-of-dietary-trends-on-reproductive-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Evaluating-the-effects-of-dietary-trends-on-reproductive-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbe8ad58-2cf4-40dc-9cdb-c3f5f3ca0b70 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 06:40:00 -0400 Evaluating the effects of dietary trends on reproductive outcomes
认知功能未受损的淀粉样蛋白阳性个体的睡眠呼吸障碍可能会加剧内侧颞叶亚区的神经变性一项新研究调查了 SDB 严重程度与内侧颞叶 (MTL) 亚结构体积之间的联系。此外，它还评估了 SDB 和 MTL 子区域卷与情景记忆性能之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Sleep-disordered-breathing-in-cognitively-unimpaired-amyloid-positive-individuals-may-exacerbate-neurodegeneration-in-medial-temporal-lobe-subregions。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Sleep-disordered-breathing-in-cognitively-unimpaired-amyloid-positive-individuals-may-exacerbate-neurodegeneration-in-medial-temporal-lobe-subregions。 aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcf74afd-7e8b-4db6-aaf2-94336a1b261c Fri, 02 Jun 2023 06:22:00 -0400 Sleep-disordered breathing in cognitively unimpaired amyloid-positive individuals may exacerbate neurodegeneration in medial temporal lobe subregions
机器学习能否使用生命最初 1000 天的数据预测儿童早期的 BMI？研究人员使用基于机器学习 (ML) 的方法来预测成年期肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Can-machine-learning-predict-BMI-in-early-childhood-using-data-from-their-first-1000-days-of-life。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Can-machine-learning-predict-BMI-in-early-childhood-using-data-from-their-first-1000-days-of-life。 aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd285d37-81d9-472e-a6f3-a46105a37923 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 06:05:00 -0400 Can machine learning predict BMI in early childhood using data from the first 1000 days of life?
研究表明人类可能已经进化出类似弹簧的足弓来帮助我们用两只脚走路最近的一项研究假设足弓反冲以推动 COM，这会影响脚踝姿势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Study-shows-humans-may-have-evolved-a-spring-like-arch-to-help-us-walk-on-two-feet。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Study-shows-humans-may-have-evolved-a-spring-like-arch-to-help-us-walk-on-two-feet。 aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4b2d881-0650-4ff7-b033-7222d8537243 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 05:39:00 -0400 Study shows humans may have evolved a spring-like arch to help us walk on two feet
患有 COVID-19 的退伍军人在退伍军人健康管理局医院和社区医院住院时是否经历过相似的结果？研究人员比较了 VHA 与社区医院中与 COVID-19 相关的死亡和再入院率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Do-veterans-with-COVID-19-experience-similar-outcomes-when-hospitalized-in-Veterans-Health-Administration-hospitals-vs-community-医院.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Do-veterans-with-COVID-19-experience-similar-outcomes-when-hospitalized-in-Veterans-Health-Administration-hospitals-vs-community-医院.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dada863-fb4b-4bcb-908f-b4ec341cb1b0 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 05:28:00 -0400 Do veterans with COVID-19 experience similar outcomes when hospitalized in Veterans Health Administration hospitals vs. community hospitals?
SARS-CoV-2 的母婴传播：评估预防措施与感染风险之间的关联研究人员评估了 SARS-CoV-2 的母婴传播率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Mother-to-child-transmission-of-SARS-CoV-2-evaluating-the-association-between-preventive-measures-and-the-risk-感染.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Mother-to-child-transmission-of-SARS-CoV-2-evaluating-the-association-between-preventive-measures-and-the-risk- of-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f9baeeb-25fd-40b8-8a10-8761a24c9d93 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 04:50:00 -0400 Mother-to-child transmission of SARS-CoV-2: evaluating the association between preventive measures and the risk of infection
生育新孩子与男性抗抑郁治疗增加有关吗？研究确定最近当父亲是否与抗抑郁治疗增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Is-having-a-new-child-associated-with-increased-antidepressant-treatment-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Is-having-a-new-child-associated-with-increased-antidepressant-treatment-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f19c2d8c-3eb2-458e-a1f0-72608669bed2 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 04:17:00 -0400 Is having a new child associated with increased antidepressant treatment in men?
产前叶酸状态在多大程度上改变了早孕全氟烷基和多氟烷基物质暴露与出生结局之间的关联？研究人员评估了怀孕期间接触 PFAS 与分娩结果之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/To-what-extent-does-prenatal-folate-status-modify-associations-between-early-pregnancy-perfluoroalkyl-and-polyfluoroalkyl-substance-exposure-和出生结果.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/To-what-extent-does-prenatal-folate-status-modify-associations-between-early-pregnancy-perfluoroalkyl-and-polyfluoroalkyl-substance-exposure- and-birth-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d79cc59-f10c-49ae-a7b3-c77d0d74e7be Fri, 02 Jun 2023 03:53:00 -0400 To what extent does prenatal folate status modify associations between early pregnancy perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substance exposure and birth outcomes?
专家表示需要将传统临床试验与分散试验进行比较南卡罗来纳州临床与转化研究所远程和虚拟试验项目的联合主任、霍林斯癌症中心研究员 Jennifer Dahne 博士在咨询临床研究人员时听到的一个问题比其他任何人都多设置远程试验，也称为分散试验。这些试验是否会克服使少数民族和服务不足的人群难以参与临床试验的障碍？这也是她经常与其他学术医疗中心的同行讨论的一个问题，这些医疗中心也是临床和转化科学奖中心的所在地。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Experts-voice-the-need-for-comparing-traditional-clinical-trials-to-decentralized-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230602/Experts-voice-the-need-for-comparing-traditional-clinical-trials-to-decentralized-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e86dcb6d-1b38-4dd6-a017-6354b9bd66c2 Fri, 02 Jun 2023 00:46:37 -0400 Experts voice the need for comparing traditional clinical trials to decentralized trials
